pr_title: [BEAM-11091] Allow to specify coder for HadoopFormatIO.Read

timeline.message: [BEAM-11091] Allow to specify coder for HadoopFormatIO.Read

timeline.bodyText: You need to clear the keyCoder/valueCoder in the non coder based variants otherwise we won't honor the typedescriptor when the user changes the translation function
timeline.author: lukecwik

timeline.bodyText: Since we don't need the type information anymore, we should use SerializableFunction instead of SimpleFunction. SimpleFunction implements SerializableFunction so this change enables using simpler lambdas.
timeline.author: lukecwik

replies.bodyText: I did try to pass in SerializableFunction but inner code of HadoopFormat does require input and output types for the function for validation, e.g. that input format value class does match translation function input class. I choose to stick with SimpleFunction but just allow to pass in the specific coder.
replies.author: JozoVilcek

timeline.message: [BEAM-11091] Allow reset back translation to not use coder

timeline.bodyText: nit: I guess the word Function is redundant here (like you called a similar key test testReadObjectCreationFailsIfKeyCoderIsNull )

replies.bodyText: I agree. Improved by next commit
